1.speaker: A
sentence: The ipad5 is coming out next month.

2.speaker: B
sentence: Wow. I have to wait in line from early morning.
와우. 난 해야겠네 줄 서서 기다려야 이른 아침부터.

3.speaker: A
sentence: since when did you get interesting in the latest gadgets?
언제부터 너는 관심을 가졌니 최신 기기에?

4.speaker: B
sentence: I keep up with treads. I wasn't born yesterday.
난 따라가고 있어 유행을. 나도 알건 알어.

5.speaker: A
sentence: on offense, but you barely know how to use smart phones.
악의는 없지만, 넌 거의 모르잖아 어떻게 쓰는지 스마트폰을.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Knock it off. You don't have to rub it in.
그만 좀 해. 넌 그러면 안돼 아픈데를 건드리면.
